items.title: Justice Department struggles to handle massive Epstein file release
items.description: The massive size of the Epstein files — perhaps more than a million pages — has created problems for the Justice Department.

items.title: What we know (and what we don’t) about the Epstein files’ release
items.description: The tranche revealed wide-ranging references to President Donald Trump and detailed efforts to interview Prince Andrew in two investigations.

items.title: Europe condemns U.S. move to bar individuals over tech monitoring
items.description: Secretary of State Marco Rubio said that the State Department would bar several Europeans for their actions in monitoring the internet, which he chara...

items.title: I am The Post’s ‘federal government whisperer.’ It’s been brutal.
items.description: One reporter’s effort to show how Trump was transforming government brought her 1,168 new sources — and nearly broke her.

items.title: Despite anti-media rhetoric, the government is still reading the news
items.description: The Trump administration is spending tens of thousands of dollars on paywalled news sites, including Politico and Bloomberg, despite earlier criticism...
